CompE560 Simple Terminal documentation
======================================

**CompE560 Simple Terminal** is a python terminal chat system that uses encrypted
UDP messages to chat between mutliple clients and a server.


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
   usage
